name: MULTIVERSE MONKEY
description: MMON is a utility token built on the Ethereum blockchain that integrates GameFi, MemeFi, and DeFi elements into a unified Web3 ecosystem. The token allows users to participate in various on-chain activities such as gaming, NFT-based content, and staking systems, with utility embedded across multiple platforms. MMON serves as the core currency in a slot casino, poker tournaments, and meme-based interactive campaigns. Unlike typical meme tokens, MMON is designed with real use cases in mind. After listing on centralized exchanges, the token follows a deflationary model, with scheduled burn events to manage supply and support long-term price stability. This structure positions MMON as both a cultural asset and a functional utility within the crypto ecosystem.
